name: FFmpeg.org
description: Where it all starts.

name: Filters
description: Docs for FFmpeg's powerful filter chains (scaling, cropping, concatenating, merging, etc.). This is one of my most visited links when working with FFmpeg.

name: Man page
description: Official FFmpeg man page.

name: Wiki & Bug Tracker
description: Lots of great info on here.

name: CLI flags
description: A comprehensive list of all FFmpeg commandline flags. Really useful for searching random flags that you come across in the wild.

name: fluent-ffmpeg
description: A fluent API to FFmpeg. If you only use one tool from this list, it should be this one.

name: ffmpeg-probe
description: Wrapper around ffprobe for getting info about media files.

name: ffmpeg-concat
description: Concats a list of videos together using FFmpeg with sexy OpenGL transitions.

name: editly
description: Declarative video editing tool and library with slick animations and transitions.

name: ffmpeg-generate-video-preview
description: Generates an attractive image strip or GIF preview from a video.

name: ffmpeg-extract-frame
description: Extracts a single frame from a video.

name: ffmpeg-extract-frames
description: Extracts screenshots from a video using FFmpeg.

name: gif-extract-frames
description: Extracts frames from GIFs including inter-frame coalescing.

name: ffmpeg-extract-audio
description: Extracts an audio stream from a media file.

name: ffmpeg-on-progress
description: Utility for robustly reporting progress with fluent-ffmpeg.

name: ffmpeg.js
description: Port of FFmpeg to JavaScript via Emscripten. Allows for limited FFmpeg use on the client-side.

name: ffmpeg-static
description: Provides static FFmpeg binaries for macOS, Linux, and Windows. Very useful for CI testing.

name: tangerine
description: Webcam streaming service using Node.js, FFmpeg, WebSockets, and Lad.

name: ffparser
description: Parse input stream by frames directly into your code as a buffer.

name: ffmpeg-gl-transition
description: FFmpeg filter for applying GLSL transitions between video streams (gl-transitions).

name: simplest ffmpeg mobile
description: FFmpeg examples for Android and iOS.

name: ijkplayer
description: Android / iOS video player based on FFmpeg.

name: How to Write a Video Player in Less Than 1k Lines
Learn FFmpeg libav the Hard Way
Applying OpenGL Shaders with FFmpeg
description: And follow-up.
